description:
Take a stack of Mac Minis or your Mac and convert it into your own private iOS build and test cloud. Then, using Jenkins and the Veertu OS X native virtualization plugin:

* Provision iOS build capsules in your cloud, on demand, in just a few minutes.

* Manage capsules for different Xcode build libraries and versions, just like you do with code, ensuring that each build can be reproduced at any time and by any team member.

* Dynamically provision as many iOS simulator test capsules for automated functional and regression testing.

* Port iOS build capsules from a developer workstation to a shared iOS build cloud
title: High Velocity iOS CI with Native OS X Virtualization Plugin
